biotools.summary: The Medical Imaging Interaction Toolkit (MITK) is a free open-source software for the development of interactive medical image processing software. Based on MITK, there is the MITK Workbench, a powerful and free application to view, process, and segment medical images.

bioschemas.name: MITK
